detaileddescription.para: Program a half-word (16-bit) at a specified address.
Program a word (32-bit) at a specified address.
Program a double word (64-bit) at a specified address

briefdescription.para: Enable the FLASH half cycle access.

simplesect.para: half cycle access can only be used with a low-frequency clock of less than 8 MHz that can be obtained with the use of HSI or HSE but not of PLL.

briefdescription.para: Disable the FLASH half cycle access.

simplesect.para: half cycle access can only be used with a low-frequency clock of less than 8 MHz that can be obtained with the use of HSI or HSE but not of PLL.

briefdescription.para: Header file of Flash HAL module.
